About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself and what I do...

Your Project Is In Safe Hands

I develop modern web applications and have experience with a great knowledge of OOP and FP. Also, I know how to use UML, Git, and API. Moreover, I worked as a freelancer on the web. I am willing to learn new things in order to improve my skills. For all the projects I participated in, I try my best to be productive and effective. I seek to find creative thoughts as much as I can. Additionally, I take an active role in project management with my ability to analyze issues, make strategic planning, and decision-making. I am suitable for teamwork, collaboration, and group leadership. Finally, I motivate the people around me well my thanks to my cheerful personality.
